ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter with various Velious gems
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes the dust still drops.  Was on a Vox raid last wednesday I believe and picked some up. ... __________________________________________________ Do You Yahoo!?
ygData.messageBody:
Yes the dust still drops. Was on a Vox raid last
wednesday I believe and picked some up.
--- Jason Brown <jasonb@...> wrote:
> I think Ice Giants do, and I think any of them have
> a chance to -- but I
> could be wrong(I'm betting I am)
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joe D [mailto:joed@...]

> Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Gemcutter with various
> Velious gems
>

> "These items do not
> combine"

>

> and

> drops it?
>
> Joe D
